SEARCH

Class Money

java.lang.Object
Money
public class Money extends Object
Money represents the money held within the vending machine. It includes coin denominations of one, five, and ten and bill denominations of twenty, fifty, one hundred, andfive hundred.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Money()
    A constructor that creates money with each denomination initialized at a stock of 4.
